00629    // Vector<double> calculateOutput(Vector<double> input, BoundaryConditionsType& boundaryConditions) method
00630 
00652 
00653    template<class BoundaryConditionsType> Vector<double> calculateOutput(Vector<double> input, 
00654    BoundaryConditionsType& boundaryConditions)
00655    {
00656       Vector<double> output(numberOfOutputs);                     
00657       
00658       int numberOfHiddenLayers = getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
00659                      
00660       // Check input for size and maximum and minimum values
00661  
00662       checkInput(input);
00663  
00664       // Preprocess input to obtain input signal to the neural network 
00665 
00666       Vector<double> inputSignal = preprocessInput(input);
00667    
00668       // Get net input signal to hidden layer
00669 
00670       Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00671       netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0] = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignal);
00672 
00673       // Get output signal from hidden layer
00674 
00675       Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00676       outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[0] = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
00677    
00678       for(int i = 1; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
00679       {
00680          netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[i] 
00681          = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(i, outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[i-1]);         
00682 
00683          outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[i] = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(i, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[i]);         
00684       }
00685 
00686       // Get net input signal to output layer
00687 
00688       Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayer 
00689       = calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
00690 
00691       // Get output signal from output layer
00692 
00693       Vector<double> outputSignal = calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);
00694   
00695       // Postprocess output signal from the neural network to get output
00696 
00697       output = postprocessOutputSignal(outputSignal);
00698 
00699       // Apply boundary conditions
00700 
00701       Vector<double> particularSolution = boundaryConditions.calculateParticularSolution(input);
00702       Vector<double> homogeneousSolution = boundaryConditions.calculateHomogeneousSolution(input);
00703 
00704       output = particularSolution + homogeneousSolution*output;
00705 
00706       // Apply lower and upper bounds
00707 
00708       output = applyLowerAndUpperBounds(output);
00709 
00710       return(output);
00711    }
00712 
00713 
00714    // Matrix<double> calculateJacobian(Vector<double>, BoundaryConditionsType&) method
00715 
00730 
00731    template<class BoundaryConditionsType> Matrix<double> calculateJacobian(Vector<double> input,
00732    BoundaryConditionsType& boundaryConditions) 
00733    {
00734       Vector<double> output = calculateOutput(input);
00735       Matrix<double> jacobian = calculateJacobian(input);
00736 
00737       // Apply boundary conditions
00738 
00739       Vector<double> particularSolution = boundaryConditions.calculateParticularSolution(input);
00740       Vector<double> homogeneousSolution = boundaryConditions.calculateHomogeneousSolution(input);
00741       Vector<double> particularSolutionDerivative = boundaryConditions.calculateParticularSolutionDerivative(input);
00742       Vector<double> homogeneousSolutionDerivative = boundaryConditions.calculateHomogeneousSolutionDerivative(input);
00743 
00744       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
00745       {
00746          for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputs; j++)
00747          {
00748             jacobian[i][0] 
00749             = particularSolutionDerivative[i] 
00750             + homogeneousSolutionDerivative[i]*output[i] 
00751             + homogeneousSolution[i]*jacobian[i][0];           
00752          }
00753       }
00754 
00755       return(jacobian);
00756    }
00757 };
00758
